message.entry: Executing tests in serial because the following plugins do not support parallel execution:\n{0}
Executing tests in serial because the following plugins do not support a thread-based parallel pool:\n{0}

Executing tests in serial because a file name or folder was specified, or the test content being run is not on the MATLAB search path. To run tests on a thread-based parallel pool, ensure that the folder defining the test content is on the path and specify the tests using the names of classes or functions, without the file extensions.
Executing tests in serial because the test authoring interface is not supported. Thread-based parallel pools support only class-based and function-based tests.
